portfolio.title: Climico
description: Built a responsive weather website providing real-time weather updates using WeatherAPI, displaying temperature, weather conditions, wind speed, and more.
Implemented dynamic UI updates based on user location or manual city search input.

portfolio.title: ExchangeBooth
description: A real-time currency converter application designed for ease of use, providing accurate global exchange rates.
Integrated instant calculation features, making it ideal for travelers and finance professionals.
